channel.title: Quinoa on iHelio
channel.description: Recent content in Quinoa on iHelio

item.title: Building a Single Page Application (SPA) with Quarkus and Quinoa
item.description: Quarkus is an exciting framework for building modern Java applications, and Quinoa takes it up a notch by streamlining Single Page Application (SPA) development. Together, they enable a seamless workflow for both frontend and backend developers. This guide walks through setting up a Quarkus-based SPA using React as an example, although the process works just as well for other frameworks. Why Quinoa Matters Quinoa elegantly integrates frontend development into Quarkus projects.
